events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated in days and the shipment is way overdue.
The system has detected keywords related to late shipment and delay in delivery, assigning this case to the Delivery Delay cluster.
Your case has been assigned to an available customer service representative to assist with your delayed order.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. I'll help look into this immediately and get back to you shortly.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the shipping address to verify the status of your package?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 Maple Street, Springfield, IL. Let me know if you need anything else.
Thanks for the details. I've checked the status and it seems the package was delayed due to a carrier issue. We can expedite a new shipment at no extra cost or offer a full refund.
I would prefer a new shipment as soon as possible, thanks for the quick solution offer. Please confirm when it will be sent out.
Your new shipment has been arranged with expedited shipping. You will receive tracking details shortly. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement order arrived safely and that you're satisfied with the resolution.
As we have received no further issues from you, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
